description:
After Blaise has joined us on our journey, we made our way to the Impaling Stones. Thanks to Naut, our travels have been going well, but I can feel danger levels are steadily rising as we approach the royal capital... I must come to a decision. What am I capable of doing to help Jess, and what should I prioritize? That night, Blaise quietly pulled me aside and opened up to me about...
Source: crunchyroll
